name: 曾淑惠
objective:
課程內容包括：技職教育的理論基礎、能力本位、建教合作、生計教育、職業輔導、技職課程與教學等理念與實務。
Course content include: theoretical foundations and developmental trends of technical and vocational education, competence-based instruction, cooperative education, career education, vocational guidance, technical and vocational education curriculum.
schedule:
1.9/22    Introduction
2.9/29   The development of technological and vocational education in Taiwan
3.10/6   philosophic foundation
4.10/13   Psychological Foundation
5.10/20   Sociological Foundation
6.10/27  Economic Foundations
7.11/3 Models of Curriculum Design (1)
8.11/10  Models of Curriculum Design (2) 
9.11/17   Midterm exam
10.11/24  Curriculum Guidelines of 12 Year Basic Education-Vocational school 
11.12/1  Vocational education and vocational training
12.12/8   Technical and Vocational Education in Primary and Secondary Schools
13.12/15  Cooperative education and industry-university cooperation
14.12/22  Important policy of vocational education
15.12/29  special topic report - 5 min each
16.1/5  special topic report - 5 min each
17.1/12  Current status and future development of technical and vocational education
18.1/19    Final exam

備註：新冠肺炎疫情二級以上警界採遠距教學 (google meets) 為原則，一級以下警戒以實體授課為原則，請修課同學留意網路學園或其他修習本課程之社群軟體群組課程相關訊息公告
